functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Desolate Scroll, Class 3\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"Great power comes at a great cost.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"That cost should make you","color":"gray"}','{"text":"reevaluate just how important the","color":"gray"}','{"text":"power is, for very little is worth","color":"gray"}','{"text":"either your sanity, humanity or","color":"gray"}','{"text":"identity, but power always costs at","color":"gray"}','{"text":"least one.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"--------","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Instant Explosion","color":"gray"}']},HoldingID:67,Unbreakable:1b,HideFlags:6,CustomModelData:13,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"generic.attack_speed",Operation:0,Amount:1024,UUID:[I;1947388157,1290199743,-506640324,1266422772],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
